data.name: SPITLINGS
data.detailed_description:
SPITLINGS is a modern take on a hardcore Arcade Classic for 1 - 4 players. Fight through 80+ stages in the story mode to unlock over 60 characters and visual themes to play with! And once you get really good at the game, try to beat the best times of your friends (or the dev times) to unlock even harder B-sides and measure yourself with the world's fastest players on the online leaderboards. Once you spit, you never quit...

Story Mode

Play 160+ levels and beat the clock to unlock 60+ themes and characters. You can play through the campaign alone or with up to four players. After playing through every stage, try to beat the Time Trials to unlock even more content or measure yourself against the best of the world on the online leaderboards!

Arcade Mode

Choose between all of the unlocked levels from the Story Mode, download the community created levels or add from your own collection. Edit level pools and several game options as needed to fit the experience to your liking. Then invite your friends and start spitting!

Community Mode

Pick your favorites out of all the levels our community has created - download them instantly, play them, rate them. The developers will hand-pick their favorite levels every week!

Co-Op Level Editor


Create your own levels - together!
A really intuitive, simple editor that can be used without prior experience to make a working level within minutes. Creating a level with four players simultaneously is a pretty unique experience - just try it out! At the press of a button, your level will be uploaded to our servers and can be played and liked by everyone who owns the game - on any platform!

Features

  • Action packed, highly engaging, scream-at-your-friends Multiplayer Fun
  • Intuitive controls, simple mechanics, no UI - the definition pick up and play
  • Play over 160+ levels in the 1 - 4 players story mode
  • When one dies, all restart: It’s co-op with the outrage of versus on top
  • 60+ themes and characters to unlock and choose from
  • Easy-to-use co-op level editor - create and destroy your ideas together

data.short_description: Frantic Gameplay, Juicy Visuals, Hypnotic Beats: SPITLINGS is a cute but unforgiving Hardcore Arcade Game in which you waggle through a gauntlet of bouncy bubbles. Invite your friends and get creative together - play your own way with the unique Co-Op Editor!
data.supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel i3 or comparable
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Intel i5 or comparable
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
